Package Game

Class Board

java.lang.Object
Game.Board
public class Board extends Object
The board class for the Dots and Boxes game.

      The fields of the Dots and Boxes board. See NUMBERING for the coding of the fields.

      public Board()
      Creates an empty board.

  • Method Details

    • deepCopy

      public Board deepCopy()
      Creates a deep copy of the board.
      Returns:
      the board

    • index

      public int index(int row, int col)
      Calculates the index in the linear array of fields from a (row, col) pair.
      Parameters:
      row - the row
      col - the col
      Returns:
      the index belonging to the (row,col)-field

    • isField

      public boolean isField(int index)
      Returns true if index is a valid index of a field on the board.
      Parameters:
      index - the index
      Returns:
      true if 0 <= index < 60

    • getField

      public Mark getField(int i)
      Returns the content of the field i.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the field (see NUMBERING)
      Returns:
      the mark on the field

    • isEmptyField

      public boolean isEmptyField(int i)
      Returns true if the field is empty.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the field (see NUMBERING)
      Returns:
      true if the field is empty

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Returns true if the whole board is full.
      Returns:
      true if all fields are full

    • gameOver

      public boolean gameOver()
      Returns true if the game is over. The game is over when there is a winner or the whole board is full.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over

    • point

      public boolean point(Move move, String team)
      Checks and adds a point to a team if they finished a box.
      Parameters:
      move - the move
      team - the team
      Returns:
      true if the team finished a box

    • validMoves

      public List<Integer> validMoves()
      Checks which are the valid moves on the board.
      Returns:
      the indexes of the valid moves.

    • inBox

      public int inBox(Move move)
      Checks if the move completes a box. The box is completed if this move is the exactly fourth line around it.
      Parameters:
      move - the move
      Returns:
      true if the move completes a box.

    • isWinner

      public boolean isWinner(String team)
      Checks if the team is the winner.
      Parameters:
      team - the team
      Returns:
      true if the team has more points than the other team.

    • teamPoints

      public int teamPoints(String team)
      Checks the points of a team.
      Parameters:
      team - the team
      Returns:
      the points

    • otherTeamPoints

      public int otherTeamPoints(String team)
      Checks the other team's points.
      Parameters:
      team - the team whose opponent's points we want to get.
      Returns:
      the points

    • hasWinner

      public boolean hasWinner()
      Checks if the game has a winner.
      Returns:
      true if the student has a winner.

    • tostring

      public String tostring()
      Returns a String representation of the board. In addition to the current situation, the String also shows the numbering of the fields.
      Returns:
      the game situation as String

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Empties all fields of this board.

    • setField

      public void setField(int i)
      Sets the content of a field.
      Parameters:
      i - the field number (see NUMBERING)
